        This method creates a new registration
        Specified by:
        createRegistration in interface INotificationHub
        Parameters:
        registration - A registration object containing the description of the registration to create. ETag and registrationid are ignored
        Returns:
        the created registration containing the read-only parameters (registrationid, etag, and expiration time).

      • createRegistrationId

        public String createRegistrationId()
        Description copied from interface: INotificationHub
        Create a registrationId, without creating an actual registration. To create use upsert. This method is used when the registration id is stored only on the device.
        Specified by:
        createRegistrationId in interface INotificationHub
        Returns:
        a registration id.
